hibernate-mapping.query: select min(rr.id), max(rr.id) from RegistryRecord rr left join rr.registry r left join rr.recordStatus rrs where r.id=? and rrs.code NOT IN (4)

select rr from RegistryRecord rr left join fetch rr.properties left join fetch rr.recordStatus rrs left join fetch rr.importError where rr.registry.id=? and rr.id>=? and rr.id<=? and rrs.code NOT IN (4)
